name: THE SEVEN-TO-NINE DECK
description:
THE SEVEN-TO-NINE CURSE DECK

  • divine your curse!
  • divine your fortune!
  • seek your innate domain!

THE END OF AN ERA! the summary of all the first-generation feyxuan characters in a curse deck. also, a deck you can actually buy from me and play for yourself!

please reply if interested in buying the deck. PWYW.

also accessible from this link: https://sevenseven.icu/
